ValidationRule.description: Disallow users from making changes in Renewed Optty with missing "Renewed contract" field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !ISNEW() && RecordTypeId = '012f2000001261k' && ISBLANK(SBQQ__RenewedContract__c) && ISBLANK(SBQQ__AmendedContract__c) && (ISCHANGED(Amount) || (ISCHANGED(StageName) && (ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won') || PRIORVALUE(StageName) = 'Closed Won')) || ISCHANGED(OwnerId))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please be sure that your Opportunity is associated with the correct 'Renewed Contract' to begin the sales cycle.
